        knowledge:
        Consolidated Content:
Raul Julia played Gomez Addams in the 1991 film "The Addams Family" and its 1993 sequel "Addams Family Values". After Julia's death in 1994, Tim Curry took up the role in the television film "Addams Family Reunion" in 1998. In the Broadway musical adaptation, Gomez was played by Nathan Lane and later replaced by Roger Rees. John Allen Astin also portrayed Gomez Addams in the 1960s television series and reprised the role in the television film "Halloween with the New Addams Family" in 1977 and the animated series "The Addams Family" from 1992 to 1993. Glenn Taranto played Gomez in the TV series "The New Addams Family" from 1998 to 1999. Additionally, Oscar Isaac voiced Gomez in the 2019 computer-animated adaptation of "The Addams Family".
